bio.title: Hello! I'm Zizazr
bio.desc:
I'am 17 years old developer who likes to explore interesting technologies and projects.
Own a Minecraft server, host it, and create mods.
Sometimes making space-related games.
Love playing with VR.

projects.desc: Minecraft проект с большим количеством модов и кастомного контента. Есть свой лаунчер на основе Gravit Launcher.
